TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit LoggerException extends System.Exception

Docs.summary: Allows a logger to force the build to stop in an explicit way.

remarks.format:
## Remarks This exception can be used by a logger to indicate to a host that it has received invalid parameters, or can no longer continue logging for some reason, and wants to stop in a controlled way.
## Examples The following example shows how to write a basic logger that responds to build events.
[!code-csharp[msbuild_BasicLogger#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Misc/msbuild_BasicLogger/CS/msbuild_BasicLogger.cs#1)]
